# init(from:)

**Initializer**

Asynchronously creates a mesh resource from a low-level mesh.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency convenience init(from mesh: LowLevelMesh) async throws
```

## Parameters

- **mesh**: The vertex data that defines the mesh.
title: init(from:)
